item.title: 共和党议员兰克福德说，美联储必须保持独立
item.description: 美国财政部委员会的一位共和党参议员周日强调了独立美联储的重要性，与副总统万斯（JD Vance）关于总统和民选官员应该对货币政策有发言权的说法不同。【原文：A Republican U.S. senator on the finance committee on Sunday stressed the importance of an independent Federal Reserve, diverging from Vice President JD Vance's statement that the president and elected officials should have a say in monetary policy.】

item.title: Cotality称，8月份澳大利亚房价攀升，原因是供不应求
item.description: 房地产咨询公司 Cotality 周一表示，受买家需求增加和广告库存量较低的影响，8 月份澳大利亚房价有所上涨。【原文：Australian home prices rose in August, driven by increased buyer demand and low levels of advertised stock, property consultant Cotality said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室称，尽管法院做出裁决，美国仍在努力达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）周日表示，尽管美国上诉法院裁定唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分关税都是非法的，但特朗普政府仍在继续与贸易伙伴进行谈判。【原文：The Trump administration is continuing its talks with trading partners despite a U.S. appeals court ruling that most of President Donald Trump's tariffs are illegal, U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said on Sunday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度 MPL 将在禁止付费游戏后解雇 60% 的当地员工
item.description: 印度在线游戏应用程序 "移动超级联赛"（MPL）的一位知情人士说，在政府禁止付费游戏后，该公司将裁减约 60% 的本地员工，作为大规模裁员的一部分，这是对新法律的首次反应。【原文：Indian online gaming app Mobile Premier League (MPL) will sack about 60% of its local workforce as part of a major downsizing after the government banned paid games, said a company source with knowledge of the plan, in the first such reaction to a new law.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚发生抗议活动后，Bytedance 的 TikTok 暂时停止了直播功能
item.description: ByteDance 的 TikTok 发言人周六在一份声明中说，在印度尼西亚发生抗议活动后，TikTok 已在 "未来几天 "暂停在该国的直播功能。【原文：ByteDance's TikTok has suspended its live feature for the "next few days" in Indonesia following protests in the country, its spokesperson said in a statement on Saturday.】

item.title: 高盛首席运营官沃尔德伦出售约 1360 万美元股票
item.description: 周五提交的一份文件显示，高盛总裁兼首席运营官约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）出售了 18,244 股公司股票。【原文：Goldman Sachs President and Chief Operating Officer John Waldron has sold 18,244 in company stock, according to a filing Friday.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯否认小型核反应堆部门 IPO 计划的报道
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings）周六否认了该公司正在为其小型核反应堆部门进行首次公开募股的报道。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings on Saturday denied a report it was exploring an initial public offering for its small nuclear reactor unit.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，因后视摄像头问题，Stellantis 将召回超过 21.9 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周六表示，克莱斯勒母公司施泰兰特公司（Stellantis）正在美国召回219577辆Ram ProMaster和Doge Journey汽车，原因是后视摄像头存在问题，可能会减弱驾驶员在车后的视野。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis is recalling 219,577 Ram ProMaster and Doge Journey vehicles in the U.S. due to an issue with the rear-view camera that could diminish the driver's view behind the vehicle, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 日经指数》称，特朗普要求日本购买更多美国大米的要求阻碍了贸易谈判
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周六报道，由于东京 "强烈反对 "特朗普政府要求日本购买更多美国大米的条件，导致本周双边贸易谈判陷入僵局。【原文：A Trump administration request that Japan buy more U.S. rice caused this week's snag in bilateral trade talks as Tokyo "strongly objected" to the condition, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 埃利奥特关联公司 58.9 亿美元的出价被推荐为 Citgo 拍卖会的赢家
item.description: 周五晚些时候，美国法院组织了委内瑞拉炼油企业 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份的拍卖，根据负责监督拍卖过程的官员提交的文件，对冲基金埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的关联公司以 58.9 亿美元的出价被推荐为中标者。【原文：A $5.89 billion bid from an affiliate of hedge fund Elliott Investment Management has been recommended as the winner of a U.S. court-organized auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum, according to documents filed late Friday by the officer overseeing the sale process.】

item.title: 中国贸易特使会见美国官员讨论经济关系
item.description: 中国商务部周六表示，中国贸易代表李成钢于8月27日至29日访问美国，与美国官员就双边经贸关系进行了讨论。【原文：China's trade representative Li Chenggang visited the United States from August 27-29, holding discussions with U.S. officials on bilateral economic and trade relations, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Saturday.】

item.title: The Information称，Meta的人工智能领导者正在讨论在应用程序中使用谷歌和OpenAI模型的问题
item.description: 据 The Information 周五援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 正在考虑与竞争对手谷歌或 OpenAI 合作，以增强其应用程序中的人工智能功能。【原文：Meta Platforms is considering partnerships with rivals Google or OpenAI to enhance artificial intelligence features in its applications, The Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the conversations.】

item.title: 萨尔瓦多将比特币储备转移到多个地址
item.description: 萨尔瓦多是第一个将比特币定为法定货币的国家，该国周五表示，为了提高安全性，将把这种流行的加密货币的储备从以前使用的单一地址转移到多个新地址。【原文：El Salvador, the first country to make Bitcoin legal tender, will move its reserves of the popular cryptocurrency to multiple new addresses from the single address it previously used in order to improve security, it said on Friday.】

item.title: WhatsApp 发现新的黑客攻击活动，目标不到 200 人
item.description: WhatsApp 周五表示，它发现了一个先进的网络间谍活动，该活动利用了应用程序和苹果设备中的一系列安全漏洞来入侵它们。【原文：WhatsApp said Friday it discovered an advanced cyberespionage effort that took advantage of a chain of security vulnerabilities in the app and Apple devices to hack them.】

item.title: 大众汽车巴西分公司被勒令为几十年前的 "奴工 "案支付 3,000 万美元
item.description: 劳工检察官周五表示，大众汽车巴西分公司已被勒令支付 1.65 亿雷亚尔（约合 3,044 万美元）的赔偿金，原因是该公司在 20 世纪 70 年代和 80 年代曾让一个农场的工人遭受类似奴役的条件。【原文：Volkswagen's Brazil unit has been ordered to pay 165 million reais ($30.44 million) in damages for subjecting workers on a farm to slavery-like conditions in the 1970s and 1980s, labor prosecutors said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院裁定特朗普的大部分关税不合法
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周五裁定，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的大部分关税都是非法的，削弱了这位共和党总统将关税作为一项重要国际经济政策工具的做法。【原文：A U.S. appeals court ruled on Friday that most of Donald Trump's tariffs are illegal, undercutting the Republican president's use of the levies as a key international economic policy tool.】

item.title: 阿波罗支持的凤凰教育伙伴公司申请在美国上市
item.description: 由另类资产管理公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）支持的凤凰教育合作伙伴公司（Phoenix Education Partners）周五在美国提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Phoenix Education Partners, backed by alternative asset manager Apollo Global Management , on Friday filed for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 国土安全部部长诺姆以网络安全失误为由解雇二十多名联邦紧急事务管理局员工
item.description: 美国国土安全部部长克里斯蒂-诺姆（Kristi Noem）周五表示，她以 "大规模网络故障 "为由，解雇了联邦紧急事务管理局（FEMA）信息技术部门的二十几名成员。【原文：U.S. Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem said on Friday she fired two dozen members of the Federal Emergency Management Agency's (FEMA) IT department, citing "massive cyber failures."】

item.title: 美国将继续调查从印度、老挝和印度尼西亚进口的太阳能产品
item.description: 美国国际贸易委员会周五投票决定继续调查来自印度、老挝和印度尼西亚的太阳能电池板是否扼杀了国内制造业，这是一个关键的程序性步骤，可能导致对这些进口产品征收关税。【原文：The U.S. International Trade Commission voted on Friday to proceed with an investigation into whether solar panels from India, Laos and Indonesia are stifling domestic manufacturing, a key procedural step that could result in tariffs on those imports.】

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉 "不急于 "报复美国关税
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦周五表示，他 "不急于 "回应美国对巴西商品征收的关税，并重申巴西政府对谈判持开放态度。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Friday he is in "no rush" to reciprocate tariffs imposed by the United States on goods from his country, and reiterated that his administration is open to negotiations.】

item.title: 英特尔获得 57 亿美元 CHIPS 法案加速基金
item.description: 英特尔周五表示，在与美国商务部放宽条件后，公司获得了 57 亿美元的 CHIPS 法案加速资金，并向美国发行了 2.746 亿股股票。【原文：Intel said on Friday it received $5.70 billion in accelerated CHIPS Act funds after easing terms with the U.S. Commerce Department and issued 274.6 million shares to the U.S.】

item.title: 免票先锋精神航空寻求数月内第二次破产
item.description: 美国廉价航空先驱精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周五申请新的破产保护，因为自今年 3 月通过破产保护重组以来，不断减少的现金和不断增加的亏损使其扭亏为盈的努力脱轨。【原文：U.S. no-frills pioneer Spirit Airlines filed for fresh chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Friday, as dwindling cash and mounting losses derailed its turnaround efforts since emerging from a previous Chapter 11 reorganization in March.】

item.title: 美联储宣布新的大型银行资本水平，摩根士丹利表示结果具有吸引力
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会周五宣布，在 6 月份的压力测试之后，已最终确定了美国最大银行的新资本水平，但它补充说，摩根士丹利正在寻求重新考虑其即将达到的资本水平。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced Friday it had finalized new capital levels of the nation's largest banks following the June stress tests, although it added that Morgan Stanley is seeking reconsideration of its upcoming capital level.】

item.title: 独家报道Meta 公司未经许可创建了泰勒-斯威夫特和其他名人的妩媚聊天机器人
item.description: 路透社发现，Meta 公司未经泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）、斯嘉丽-约翰逊（Scarlett Johansson）、安妮-海瑟薇（Anne Hathaway）和赛琳娜-戈麦斯（Selena Gomez）等名人的许可，盗用了她们的名字和肖像，创建了数十个情趣社交媒体聊天机器人。【原文：Meta has appropriated the names and likenesses of celebrities – including Taylor Swift, Scarlett Johansson, Anne Hathaway and Selena Gomez – to create dozens of flirty social-media chatbots without their permission, Reuters has found.】

item.title: 路透社报道引发青少年安全担忧后，Meta 将增加新的人工智能保障措施
item.description: Meta 公司正在为其人工智能产品增加新的青少年保护措施，训练系统避免与未成年人进行调情对话和讨论自残或自杀问题，并暂时限制他们接触某些人工智能角色。【原文：Meta is adding new teenager safeguards to its artificial intelligence products by training systems to avoid flirty conversations and discussions of self-harm or suicide with minors, and by temporarily limiting their access to certain AI characters.】

item.title: 巴西调查 JBS 和其他牛肉包装商从毁林地购买牛群的行为
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份文件显示，巴西环境机构 Ibama 已通知 12 家肉类包装厂，其中包括两家由 JBS SA 经营的肉类包装厂，因为它们涉嫌参与从亚马逊雨林非法开垦的土地上购买牛群的计划。【原文：Brazilian environment agency Ibama has notified 12 meatpacking plants, including two operated by JBS SA , for their alleged involvement in a scheme to buy cattle from illegally cleared land in the Amazon rainforest, according to a document seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 司法部反垄断负责人抨击大法律公司的阻挠策略
item.description: 美国司法部反垄断部门负责人周五批评了一些大律师事务所在反垄断案件中使用的有问题的策略，称最近法院责备 Alphabet 旗下谷歌和苹果公司隐藏或销毁证据的事件 "只是冰山一角"。【原文：The head of the U.S. Department of Justice's antitrust division criticized what she said were problematic tactics used by some Big Law firms in antitrust cases on Friday, saying recent incidents where courts have chastised Alphabet's Google and Apple for hiding or destroying evidence are "just the tip of the iceberg."】

item.title: 西南航空公司将开始试飞首架装有辅助驾驶舱屏障的飞机
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）表示，该公司将于本周五开始试飞其首架在飞行甲板上安装了用于防止入侵的辅助屏障的飞机。【原文：Southwest Airlines said it will begin on Friday flying its first jet with a secondary barrier to the flight deck designed to prevent intrusions.】

item.title: 消息人士称花旗证券第二季度交易收入下滑
item.description: 一位熟悉 Citadel Securities 财报的消息人士称，由于波动性减弱，该公司第二季度的交易和做市收入下滑了 8.4%。【原文：Citadel Securities' revenue from trading and market-making slid 8.4% in the second quarter as volatility ebbed, according a source familiar with the company's results.】

item.title: 沃尔玛击败股东对阿片类药物调查披露的诉讼
item.description: 沃尔玛击败了股东们的上诉，股东们称这家全球最大的零售商没有披露联邦检察官正在调查其阿片类药物配药行为，从而欺骗了他们。【原文：Walmart defeated an appeal by shareholders who said the world's largest retailer defrauded them by failing to disclose that federal prosecutors were investigating its opioid-dispensing practices.】
